com.RacingDroneWIKI.spring.config

类 WebConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
      • com.RacingDroneWIKI.spring.config.WebConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @ImportResource(value="classpath:spring/spring-mybatis.xml")
 @EnableWebMvc
 @EnableAspectJAutoProxy(proxyTargetClass=true)
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.RacingDroneWIKI")
public class WebConfig
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
    The type Web config. SpringMVC 核心配置
    版本:
    SSM 3.0
    作者:
    ChunsiYang
